SummaryEnglish: Meet Bolt Crank, mercenary extraordinaire, and the man who eats metal! Through his travels, he stops along the way to make a few bucks and occasionally rescue damsels in distress. His taste for metal gives him quite an edge as he becomes capable of generating an assortment of weapons from his hand! It's a strange ability, but it seems to come in handy, so to speak. Bolt has an edge over his adversaries, but will that be enough?

1.SummaryEnglish: Meet Bolt Crank, mercenary extraordinaire, and the man who eats metal! Through his travels, he stops along the way to make a few bucks and occasionally rescue damsels in distress. His taste for metal gives him quite an edge as he becomes capable of generating an assortment of weapons from his hand! It's a strange ability, but it seems to come in handy, so to speak. Bolt has an edge over his adversaries, but will that be enough?

The businessman Mark Mitchell meets the explorer Kyurene at an inn on the outskirts of Darjan. Mitchell promises the explorer five million in return for the assassination of a mob boss. A mysterious man cleaning up the bar attracts their attention.

2.SummaryEnglish: To shed light on an island used for biological experiments in the past, the armed forces ask for the help of an expert biologist and Crank Bolt, the world's best explorer. They land on the island and set out in search of what caused an entire battalion to go missing.

3.SummaryEnglish: Bolt Crank is commissioned by the Dusolier Corporation to steal a painting preserved in the Hotel Promise, where he is captivated by the charms of the proprietor Anina. The young heiress is shaken and confesses to Bolt her fear of losing her inheritance due to a special condition in her grandparents' Will.

4.SummaryEnglish: The country of Dwide is in the midst of an invasion by its neighbor. They hire Bolt to rescue a captured Mercenary before he breaks and reveals vital information to the enemy.

5.SummaryEnglish: A dancer at a night club has big dreams she wishes to chase. Running into Bolt one rainy night might be the catalyst to change her destiny.

6.SummaryEnglish: A woman enlists Bolt's help in hunting down an item her father left behind for her. The job leads them to what is ostensibly a garbage dump, but is so much more beneath its surface.

7.SummaryEnglish: A nun on a proselytisation mission has her faith shaken when she meets Bolt. She must face down a murderer whom believes he is granting salvation to his victims in a way the church cannot.

8.SummaryEnglish: A prison warden hires Bolt to figure out what secret a death row inmate is hiding, and whether she is truly deserving of the death penalty.

9.SummaryEnglish: A demolisher requests Bolt's assistance in reaching an abandoned airship in time to destroy it before it crash lands into his city.

10.SummaryEnglish: Bolt is hired to act as a bodyguard and escort a Major safely back to her men, but the scope of this job extends far beyond initial expectations.

11.SummaryEnglish: A doctor nurses Bolt back to health following an injury which leaves his memories in disarray. As his memories return, the peaceful setting he finds himself in makes him question returning to his life as a Mercenary.

12.SummaryEnglish: Bolt is brought back to life for one last job: bringing down Lavion so it can be studied and another ship which defies gravity can be created in its wake. The only problem is that Bolt refuses to be a Mercenary any longer.

2.SummaryEnglish: When Bolt Crank, codenamed Eat-Man, literally eats every single piece of a weapon, he can transform the flesh of his arm into that weapon on cue. One of a team of mercenaries with bizarre superpowers, Bolt's unique ability and cool charisma attract only the very cutest sweet young things.

1.SummaryEnglish: Bolt is suspected of killing several biotech scientists.

2.SummaryEnglish: The truth behind the experiments comes out, and the culprit is brought to justice. Or so it seems...

3.SummaryEnglish: A small village hires Bolt Crank to protect them from an expansionist company.

4.SummaryEnglish: Bolt is hired to protect a girl. But he's only got an hour until the next transport.

5.SummaryEnglish: Bolt arrives in a country where the king will be determined by whosoever can wield a certain sword.

6.SummaryEnglish: With the sword stolen and a demon on a rampage, Bolt's got his work cut out for him.

7.SummaryEnglish: Coco's past comes back to haunt her. Meanwhile, the Ambrosian Sword has been found.

8.SummaryEnglish: Even with the sword recovered, Du Marc's plans for Ambrosia come to a head.

9.SummaryEnglish: Bolt has a job to escort a runaway girl back to her father. But this might be more than just a job for Bolt.

10.SummaryEnglish: Mira's memories have mostly returned, but the whole story has yet to be revealed.

11.SummaryEnglish: Someone is trying to kill two political leaders, but Bolt thinks there's more to it than assassination.

12.SummaryEnglish: Hard confronts Raffin, but learns the unfortunate truth behind the whole affair.
